cards.name: Ares
cards.description: On Reveal: Compare the Power of the top 3 cards of both decks. If your total is higher, +6 Power.

cards.name: Misery
cards.description: On Reveal: Repeat the On Reveal abilities of your other cards here, then destroy them.

cards.name: MsMarvel
cards.description: Ongoing: Your adjacent locations with 2+ cards and no repeated Costs have +5 Power.

cards.name: JoaquinTorres
cards.description: Ongoing: The On Reveal abilities of your 1-Cost cards here happen twice.

cards.name: Makkari
cards.description: After the turn, runs from your hand to a random location. (if possible)

cards.name: Namora
cards.description: On Reveal: Give +5 Power to each of your cards alone at another location.

cards.name: ThaddeusRoss
cards.description: When your opponent ends a turn with unspent Energy, draw a card with 10 or more Power.

cards.name: Blink
cards.description: On Reveal: Swap the last card you played with a higher-Cost card from your deck.

cards.name: Nebula
cards.description: Each turn your opponent doesn't play a card here, +2 Power. (except the turn you play this)

cards.name: Redwing

cards.name: BaronZemo
cards.description: On Reveal: Recruit a card that costs the least from your opponent's deck to your side of this location.

cards.name: Loki
